image-ditherer.title: 1-Bit Image Ditherer
image-ditherer.description: Convert your images to 1-bit dithered art with various algorithms. Adjust brightness, contrast, and other parameters to achieve the perfect retro look. Perfect for pixel art, e-ink displays, or nostalgic designs.

bitmap-font-designer.title: Bitmap Font Designer
bitmap-font-designer.description: Design your own bitmap font characters and export them as JSON for use on your device!
